subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paul Lawrie chipped in for an eagle and a birdie on his way to winning the wind-shortened Qatar Open in Doha, shooting a seven-under-par 65 to hold off Jason Day and Peter Hanson.
snippet: Paul Lawrie chipped in for an eagle and a birdie on his way to winning the wind-shortened Qatar Open in Doha, shooting a seven-under-par 65 to hold off Jason Day and Peter Hanson.
